Index of /public/ftp/pub/Linux/system/admin/login

What you'll find here: tools for handling user logins

You can also view this index in terse format, or return to the parent directory.

grouputils-1.1.tgz (LSM entry) 1997-08-13
Group admin utilities; support for group passwords at login (30215 bytes)
ku-1.0.0.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1998-08-31
utility for maintaining shell logins (38066 bytes)
login-extlog.tar.gz (README) 1995-01-31
syslog's every login sttempt (13527 bytes)
loginhog-1.00.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1994-12-23
prevents multiple user logins for certain users/terminals (6732 bytes)
lshell-2.01.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1995-03-12
executes login shell after setting resource limits (6022 bytes)
news-0.8.tgz (LSM entry) (LSM entry) 1995-01-20
shows system news at login (13749 bytes)
news-0.9.tgz (LSM entry) (LSM entry) 1997-01-10
shows system news at login (14578 bytes)
poeigl-1.39.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1996-01-05
init, getty, and login for linux (src) (53124 bytes)
sac-1.7.tgz (LSM entry) 1998-04-23
performs login accounting (better then ac) (56360 bytes)
ttc-3.0.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1999-04-21
terminal type control program; allow/deny logins of given types (32357 bytes)
